EmailTemplate.description: Sends login credentials to newly approved Community Members, welcoming them to the organization and providing their username and login link.
EmailTemplate.name: Approved Community Member - Login Details
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to our Community!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
[Image alt text: RiseTogetherLogo] Dear {{{Recipient.Name}}},
Welcome to our Community! Your account has been successfully created. You can now access your account and participate in our events and activities.
Here are your login details:
Username : {{{Recipient.Username__c}}}
Password : {{{Recipient.Password__c}}}
To login to Rise Together: Click Here < https://ajsd-b-dev-ed.develop.my.site.com/RiseTogetherPortal >
If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out.
Warm Regards
Rise Together Team
RiseTogether < https://ajsd-b-dev-ed.develop.my.site.com/RiseTogetherPortal >
